name.label: Name
name.description: Public name for this sale round

tokenName.label: Token Name
tokenName.description: Long name for the token. I.e: Chainlink

tokenSymbol.label: Token Symbol
tokenSymbol.description: Short name for the token. I.e: LINK

tokenContractChainId.label: Blockchain
tokenContractChainId.description: Chain where the token is deployed

toWalletsAddress.label: Wallet Address
toWalletsAddress.description: Destination wallet address to receive funds for sales

tokenPricePerUnit.label: Price per Unit
tokenPricePerUnit.description: Price the token will be sold in this sale

saleCurrency.label: Currency
saleCurrency.description: FIAT Currency to be used in this sale for the PPU

initialTokenQuantity.label: Initial Token Quantity
initialTokenQuantity.description: Total amount of tokens released for this sale

availableTokenQuantity.label: Available Token Quantity
availableTokenQuantity.description: Amount of tokens Actually available for sale (in case is less than initial value)

minimumTokenBuyPerUser.label: Minimum Token Buy Per User
minimumTokenBuyPerUser.description: Minimum amount of tokens a user can buy per purchase

maximumTokenBuyPerUser.label: Maximum Token Buy Per User
maximumTokenBuyPerUser.description: Maximum amount of tokens a user can buy per purchase

saftCheckbox.label: SAFT Agreement
saftCheckbox.description: Tick the box if this sale requires a SAFT agreement for users to buy
